thread.title: A very good hockey dog sat in the stands and enjoyed the Stars game
thread.title_full: A very good hockey dog sat in the stands and enjoyed the Stars game

author: Mary Clarke
title: A very good hockey dog sat in the stands and enjoyed the Stars game
text:
What a dog!
We here at SB Nation love dogs . You probably do too if you clicked this! Hockey dogs are some of the best sports dogs. Why? Well they have races on ice and drop pucks before games , for starters. 
They can also do absolutely nothing but be the best dogs ever and we’d still write about them. Like this dog in Dallas taking in the Stars and Canadiens game!
Hi dog. #MTLvsDAL pic.twitter.com/ut6n5IgcwV 
— NHL (@NHL) January 5, 2017 What a dog. Even popular Twitter account WeRateDogs agrees!
@NHL OMG HELLO DOG
— WeRateDogs™ (@dog_rates) January 5, 2017 Hello friend!
